deals.title: Double Cheeseburger
deals.itemDescription: Two flame-grilled patties–for a 1/4 lb* of beef–with melted American cheese, crunchy pickles, yellow mustard, and ketchup on a toasted sesame seed bun. *Weight based on pre-cooked patty. 400 Cal
